entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: ENE 47 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 20 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming southwest 20. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
